document.full_text: in his annual speech to parliament, prime minister vladimir v. putin of russia detailed his achievements in three years while giving no insight into the burning question of what he would do at the end of his term next year.
document.title: europe: russia: putin boasts but avoids a burning question
lines_and_colors: in his annual speech to parliament, prime minister vladimir v. putin of russia detailed his achievements in three years while giving no insight into the burning question of what he would do at the end of his term next year.
